Authors

List Of Authors

This is an incomplete list of botanists by their author abbreviation, which is designed for citation with the botanical names or works that they have published. This list follows that established by Brummitt & Powell (1992).

  • A.A.Cocucci – Andrea A. Cocucci [es] (born 1959)
  • A.A.Hend. – Andrew Augustus Henderson (1816–1876)
  • Abedin – Sultanul Abedin [Wikidata] (fl. 1986)
  • Abramov – Ivan N. Abramov (1884–1953)
  • Proin gravida nibh vel velit auctor
  • Achv. – Agazi Asaturovich Achverdov (born 1907)
  • A.C.Schultz – August Christian Schultz (1813–1908)
  • A.D.Danilov – Alexander Danilovich Danilov (born 1903)

R. K. Brummitt

Richard "Dick" Kenneth Brummitt ( Liverpool , 22 of maypole of 1937 - 18 of September of 2013 ) 1 was a botanist not only British, famous for being specialized in the study of the Fabaceae African, but above all for having published in 1992 , together with C. Emma Powell , an important text on the standardization of botanical nomenclature : the book Authors of Plant Names

Carl Linnaeus

Carl Linnaeus, also known after his ennoblement as Carl von Linné, was a Swedish botanist, zoologist, taxonomist, and physician who formalised binomial nomenclature, the modern system of naming organisms. He is known as the "father of modern taxonomy"

Sandra Knapp

Sandra Diane Knapp FLS is an American born botanist. She is currently the president of the Linnaean Society and is a merit researcher of the Plants Division of the Natural History Museum, London.
